1.5.name: wordpress/goodbye-bar
1.5.description:
Allows the user to remove the Wordpress Admin Bar from their sites.

The admin bar can be removed entirely or left on for different class of users

So for example, you may want "admin" to see it but no-one else.

Operation is simple.

1 - Just go to the "Settings" tab and select "Goodbye bar"

2 - You will have a list of checkboxes, now select which users you want to see the admin bar.

3 - Click "Goodbye Bar!"

Job done!
